players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Suspect Diana, keep an eye on Bob."
Diana: "Will do, Alice. Both Charlie and Bob are suspects now."
Bob: "Will keep an eye on both Diana and Bob. Any info?"
Bob: "Monitoring Diana & Bob closely. Any info on Charlie's death?"
Diana: "Monitoring Alice & Bob. Charlie's death by mafia, watch each other."
You: "Monitoring D, B closely. Charlie's death by mafia. Stay alert."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
